articles.title: Video: UPS driver collapses from heat then gets up to finish delivery  - CNN Video
articles.description: An Arizona UPS driver is seen walking up to a front door, placing down an envelope and collapsing. The driver then takes a moment before getting up to complete the job. HLN's Robin Meade has the report.

articles.author: Theresa Waldrop, CNN
articles.title: What we know about the armed bystander who killed the shooter at an Indiana mall
articles.description: Dressed in shorts and a T-shirt, Elisjsha Dicken was shopping with his girlfriend when a gunman opened fire on a food court at a Greenwood, Indiana, mall Sunday evening, killing three people and wounding two others.

articles.author: Analysis by Angela Dewan, International Climate Editor
articles.title: UK smashes its hottest-day record, 100 million Americans under alerts in global heat emergency
articles.description: Heat waves across multiple continents have dashed records, threatened public health and bucked infrastructure, in what scientists say are signs of the climate crisis' impact on day-to-day weather.

articles.author: Payton Major and Judson Jones, CNN
articles.title: More than 100 million in the US face excessive warning or heat advisories as a dangerous heat wave continues
articles.description: Heat alerts cover more than 20 states today and tomorrow across the Southern Plains and parts of the Northeast, and temperatures will soar above the century mark for 60 million people over the next week.

articles.author: Betsy Klein, CNN
articles.title: Biden preparing executive action on climate after Manchin sinks legislative approach
articles.description: The White House is preparing a plan to take executive action on climate after Democratic Sen. Joe Manchin last week torpedoed his party's efforts on sweeping legislation.

articles.author: By Aditi Sangal, Mike Hayes, JiMin Lee, Elise Hammond, Maureen Chowdhury, Meg Wagner and Melissa Macaya, CNN
articles.title: Steve Bannon's trial begins: Live updates
articles.description: Former Trump aide Steve Bannon is on trial on contempt of Congress charges for his failure to comply with a Jan. 6 House committee subpoena last year. Follow here for lives news updates.
articles.content:
Steve Bannon is headed to trial on two criminal charges for his failure to comply with the House's Jan. 6, 2021, investigation 10 months after receiving subpoenas from the select committee.

articles.title: Heat wave scorches Europe as UK braces for record-breaking day
articles.description: A heat wave is stifling the UK, which had its hottest night on record Monday, and engulfing parts of southern Europe. Follow here for lives news updates.
articles.content:
Whether youre without power, enduring extreme heat or trying to save money, there are ways to feel comfortable without artificial cooling.

articles.author: Joseph Ataman, Jimmy Hutcheon, Xiaofei Xu, Zahid Mahmood, Sana Noor Haq, and Jorge Engels, CNN
articles.title: Extreme heat sears parts of Europe, with UK seeing third-hottest day on record
articles.description: Extreme heat has engulfed parts of western Europe, with wildfires raging in France and Spain, a worsening drought in Portugal, and the third hottest day on record in the UK on Monday.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why the US is so horribly incapable of meaningful climate action
articles.description: While the world's climate is hot and getting hotter, the US government is frozen in time.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez and Angela Fritz, CNN
articles.title: Hot records are outpacing cool by more than 10-to-1 this year as Europe, US brace for dangerous heat
articles.description: Hot-temperature records are far outpacing cool records across the globe this year as Europe and the United States brace again for dangerous heat waves.
articles.content:
